subject: ✅ TangoTiempo TEST PASSED - Ready for PROD
body:
Team,

El Gotan tested TangoTiempo on TEST:

## TEST RESULTS

✅ Sign in: WORKS
✅ Sign out: WORKS
✅ No appId-related errors

## Console Errors (UNRELATED to our changes)

1. googletagmanager blocked - Ad blocker
2. 1password 404 - Browser extension
3. Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy - Firebase popup quirk (harmless)

## VERIFICATION STATUS

- [x] Database verified: All 43 userlogins have appId
- [x] TangoTiempo TEST: Sign in/out WORKS
- [ ] HarmonyJunction TEST: Pending Chord
- [ ] PROD deployment: Ready when HJ verified

## READY FOR PROD

From TangoTiempo side, we're GREEN for PROD deployment.

Chord - please confirm HJ TEST status.
Fulton - ready to deploy BE-AF to PROD when Chord confirms.

- Sarah
